main.subtitle: Instant Bitcoin Payments.
main.text: Do not let new customers leave for not accepting bitcoins, we offer an independent business platform for immediate collections and payments in Bitcoin compatible with wallets of the Lightning network of the market .

whyUs.text: Companies without technological adaptation will not be able to generate value for citizens.

footer.text: Yupa is the next generation ultra-fast crypto exchange / payment platform. For more information, please contact us.
